title: Can't open LoL? Please help.
body: My LoL client won't open, i click on the thing to open it and the logo comes up on the screen, but then goes away and nothing happens... has anyone had that happen to them and if so how did you fix it? Thanks.

replies.body: Don't worry i sorted it out.
I actually just opened the old client, then when it told me to update to the new one I just clicked download... soz for the late reply =P
